game.name: Forsake the Rake
game.description:
Both you and your friend want to sort out the query related to the Rake. The officers ordered you to visit the nearest forest where you have to go to a huge and secret underground lab. In this brand new action game, you also have to find out a nearby abandoned underground lab where the truth about the Rake is hidden. Use your brain and get ready to shoot your enemies with the high-definition guns! Know about the controls before completing your game!

In this one of the best shooting games for boys, you are sure to enjoy while investigating the movements of the mysterious being ? The Rake. Your friend will stay with you along your journey. So, don?t hesitate to get his help while pulling the curtains off about different mysteries and puzzles related to the character. With 10 levels to play, fabulous 3D graphics and smooth controls ? this fun mystery game is enough to keep you occupied for hours. It will entertain you when you control the story about a mystery rake here!

Get ready to explore the forest and collect as much information as you can about the Rake in this highly addictive action game! The dark gameplay is pretty challenging and supported by the ultimate 3D graphics! Also get a chance to play this game in full-screen! All the best for uncovering the hidden secrets and meeting the challenges confidently in one of this horror games for kids! Don?t forget to take the gun and pay attention to details to achieve the goal of the game!Â
